verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the west, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> how <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had dried <S%H3001><s%> up the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they had crossed, <S%H5674><s%> that their hearts <S%H3824><s%> melted, <S%H4549><s%> and there was no <S%H3808><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in them any <S%H5750><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

At that time <S%H6256><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself flint <S%H6864><s%> knives <S%H2719><s%> and circumcise <S%H4135><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time. <S%H8145><s%>"
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> himself flint <S%H6864><s%> knives <S%H2719><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at Gibeath-haaraloth.

And this <S%H2088><s%> is the reason <S%H1697><s%> why <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> circumcised <S%H4135><s%> them: all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> who were males, <S%H2145><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> along the way, <S%H1870><s%> after they came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> out were circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who were born <S%H3209><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> along the way <S%H1870><s%> as they came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> had not been circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

For the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> [that is,] the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> perished <S%H8552><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> that He would not let them see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers to give <S%H1><s%> us, a land <S%H5414><s%> flowing <S%H776><s%> with milk <S%H2100><s%> and honey. <S%H2461><s%>

And their children <S%H1121><s%> whom He raised <S%H6965><s%> up in their place, <S%H8478><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> circumcised; <S%H4135><s%> for they were uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> them along the way. <S%H1870><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> they had finished <S%H8552><s%> circumcising <S%H4135><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> that they remained <S%H3427><s%> in their places <S%H8478><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were healed. <S%H2421><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Today <S%H3117><s%> I have rolled <S%H1556><s%> away <S%H1556><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from you." So the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

While the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> camped <S%H2583><s%> at Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> they observed <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> on the evening <S%H6153><s%> of the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> on the desert <S%H6160><s%> plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And on the day <S%H4283><s%> after <S%H4283><s%> the Passover, <S%H6453><s%> on that very <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> they ate <S%H398><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the produce <S%H5669><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H4682><s%> and parched <S%H7033><s%> [grain].

And the manna <S%H4478><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> on the day <S%H4283><s%> after <S%H4283><s%> they had eaten <S%H398><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the produce <S%H8393><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> so that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> manna, <S%H4478><s%> but they ate <S%H398><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the yield <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> during that year. <S%H8141><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was by Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> that he lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> was standing <S%H5975><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> him with his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to him and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Are you for us or <S%H518><s%> for our adversaries <S%H6862><s%>?"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H3808><s%> rather <S%H3588><s%> I indeed <S%H3588><s%> come <S%H935><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> [as] captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>" And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> down, <S%H7812><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> has my lord <S%H136><s%> to say <S%H1696><s%> to his servant <S%H5650><s%>?"

And the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the Lord's host <S%H6635><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Remove <S%H5394><s%> your sandals <S%H5275><s%> from your feet, <S%H7272><s%> for the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you are standing <S%H5975><s%> is holy. <S%H6944><s%>" And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>
